        private MarketAdjustableActor createAdjustable(ResourceType resource,
                                               boolean buy)
        Generate an adjustable actor for sell/buy.
        Parameters:
        resource - The resource type.
        buy - true if is for buying, or false if is for selling
        Returns:
        The adjustable actor generated.

      • setGambleRollLabels

        public void setGambleRollLabels(int playerRoll,
                                int AIroll)
        Sets the labels indicating the values returned by the two dice rolled in the last attempted gamble
        Parameters:
        playerRoll - The value returned by the player's die in the last attempted gamble
        AIroll - The value returned by the game's die in the last attempted gamble

      • setGambleRollLabels

        public void setGambleRollLabels(java.lang.String playerRoll,
                                java.lang.String AIroll)
        Sets the labels indicating the values returned by the two dice rolled in the last attempted gamble Overloaded method that sets the aforementioned labels' representations directly using the parameters given
        Parameters:
        playerRoll - The string encoding the value returned by the player's die in the last attempted gamble
        AIroll - The string encoding the value returned by the game's die in the last attempted gamble

      • setGambleStatisticsLabels

        public void setGambleStatisticsLabels(int moneyWon,
                                      int moneyLost,
                                      int winLoss)
        Sets the labels indicating the statistics covering the gambles attempted by the player in the current turn
        Parameters:
        moneyWon - The total amount of money won by the player from gambles in the current turn
        moneyLost - The total amount of money lost by the player from gambles in the current turn
        winLoss - The difference in wins and losses experienced while gambling in the current turn
